EmailTemplate.name: Approved-Pickup Check Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Request Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Contact}:
Please accept our heartfelt condolences during this difficult time. We are here to offer our full support. We have carefully reviewed your Liquidation Funds request associated with ticket {!Case.CaseNumber}, and we are pleased to inform you that it has been approved. Your check is now available for pick-up at our {!Case.Branch_Name__c} branch in {!Case.Branch_Town__c}.
We kindly ask you to bring a valid form of identification and mention the ticket number upon arrival. If there's anything more we can do to assist you, please don't hesitate to reach out
We are here to serve you; Banco Popular de Puerto Rico
